name: contuse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to develop or cause a bruise (= a dark mark on the skin caused by an injury): When the skin is trapped between an impacting force and the ribs, it contuses. The soft brain is easily contused by the hard bony ridges at the base of the skull. See
contusion
More examplesFewer examplesThe impact could contuse the skin.This may contuse the soft tissues.
